title: Recipe Creator
description: Intelligent recipe recommendation system with MCP and OpenAI.
features: Personalized recipes based on available ingredients

usage.title: Create a new VoltAgent app
usage.description: Initialize a new project with the recipe creator example.

usage.title: Set environment variables
usage.description: Add your API keys to the .env file.

prompts: I have chicken, rice, and vegetables. What can I make in 30 minutes?
Create a vegetarian pasta recipe with mushrooms and spinach
Suggest healthy breakfast options with oats and fruits
What can I make with leftover turkey and potatoes?
Need a quick dessert recipe using chocolate and bananas

title: Customer Support Agent

usage.title: Create a new VoltAgent app
usage.description: Initialize a new project with the customer support example.

usage.title: Set environment variables
usage.description: Add your OpenAI API key to the .env file.

prompts: How do I reset my password?
I'm having trouble with my order #12345
Can you explain your return policy?

title: Data Analysis Agent
description: Data analysis agent for insights and visualization generation.

usage.title: Create a new VoltAgent app
usage.description: Initialize a new project with the data analysis example.

usage.title: Set environment variables
usage.description: Add your Anthropic API key to the .env file.

prompts: Analyze this sales data and find trends
What are the key insights from this dataset?
Calculate the correlation between price and sales
Identify any anomalies in the data

title: Code Review Agent
description: Code review assistant for quality analysis and bug detection.

usage.title: Create a new VoltAgent app
usage.description: Initialize a new project with the code review example.

usage.title: Set environment variables
usage.description: Add your OpenAI API key to the .env file.

prompts: Review this TypeScript function for best practices
Check this code for potential security issues
Suggest performance improvements for this algorithm
Is this code following SOLID principles?
